education_text.0: At      Jamaica High School Jamaica High School in      redirect    Queens, New York Queens, New York, Diffie  performed competently  but  never did apply himself to the degree his father hopedFrom 1965 to 1969, he remained in      Greater Boston Greater Boston as a research assistant for the      redirect    MITRE Corporation MITRE Corporation in      Bedford, Massachusetts Bedford, MassachusettsIn November 1969, Diffie became a research programmer at the      redirect    Stanford Artificial Intelligence Laboratory Stanford Artificial Intelligence Laboratory, where he worked on   Diffie left SAIL to pursue independent research in cryptography in May 1973Hellman then hired Diffie as a funded time research programmer for the 1975 spring termFrom 1978 to 1991, Diffie was Manager of Secure Systems Research for      redirect    Nortel Networks Northern Telecom in      Mountain View, California Mountain View, California, where he designed the key management architecture for the PDSO security system for   Diffie is a member of the technical advisory boards of BlackRidge Technology, and      Cryptomathic where he collaborates with researchers such as      Vincent Rijmen Vincent Rijmen,   In 2018, he joined      Zhejiang University Zhejiang University, China, as a visiting professor, Cryptic Labs generated 2 months course in Zhejiang UniversityIn 2018, he joined      Zhejiang University Zhejiang University, China, as a visiting professor, Cryptic Labs generated 2 months course in Zhejiang University
